mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sickness AS "sickness", a.gene_name AS "geneName", a.gene_logogram AS "geneLogogram", a.gene_loci AS "geneLoci", a.gene_type AS "geneType", a.gene_composite AS "geneComposite", a.gene_type_flag AS "geneTypeFlag", a.gene_literature AS "geneLiterature", a.gene_rpn AS "geneRpn", a.gene_correlation AS "geneCorrelation", a.gene_health_suggest AS "geneHealthSuggest", a.gene_medicine_suggest AS "geneMedicineSuggest", a.gene_mechanism AS "geneMechanism", a.gene_detection AS "geneDetection", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gene_dm_base_gene( id, sickness, gene_name, gene_logogram, gene_loci, gene_type, gene_composite, gene_type_flag, gene_literature, gene_rpn, gene_correlation, gene_health_suggest, gene_medicine_suggest, gene_mechanism, gene_detection, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sickness}, #{geneName}, #{geneLogogram}, #{geneLoci}, #{geneType}, #{geneComposite}, #{geneTypeFlag}, #{geneLiterature}, #{geneRpn}, #{geneCorrelation}, #{geneHealthSuggest}, #{geneMedicineSuggest}, #{geneMechanism}, #{geneDetection}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gene_dm_base_gene SET sickness = #{sickness}, gene_name = #{geneName}, gene_logogram = #{geneLogogram}, gene_loci = #{geneLoci}, gene_type = #{geneType}, gene_composite = #{geneComposite}, gene_type_flag = #{geneTypeFlag}, gene_literature = #{geneLiterature}, gene_rpn = #{geneRpn}, gene_correlation = #{geneCorrelation}, gene_health_suggest = #{geneHealthSuggest}, gene_medicine_suggest = #{geneMedicineSuggest}, gene_mechanism = #{geneMechanism}, gene_detection = #{geneDetection}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
